text: @PressSec @kimguilfoyle Yes, Kayleigh, like Donald Trump, Herman Cain was a stupid man. He went to Trump’s Tulsa Oklahoma rally, advocating for no masks, and was hospitalized 2 weeks later with the Coronavirus..... and has just died.
